attributes.action: Hold an Independent Enquiry on MP's Expenses
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: No Mps should be allowed to sit on the enquiry which should be followed by a clear and unambiguos rewriting of the rules.

rejection.details: There is a similar petition at: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/MP-Fraudsters/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
